channel.title: Spotify on LinuxUK
channel.description: Recent content in Spotify on LinuxUK

item.title: Spotify as a Snap, putting the developer in control
item.description: Just before Christmas Canonical announced that the world’s most popular music streaming service, Spotify, is now available as a Snap, but what makes this significant I hear you ask? Well Spotify and many other developers are choosing a new way of delivering software to Linux users and Snaps are at the forefront. One of the important aspects of Snaps is not so much about the technology, but more about where the software comes from.
